long_description: The women's Flow Jewel snowboard is built to dominate rails and jumps. With a freestyle flex and a twin shape, you'll be ready to take on any feature in the park. I-ROCK profile features rocker between the feet, camber under your bindings, and a rockered tip and tail for amazing stability, control and pop; twin tip shape. TruFlex core features a poplar wood construction with mixed density wood for a lightweight, responsive ride; fiberglass adds extra pop and an easy torsional flex to the board. Fiberglass beneath the heel and toe areas of the binding eliminates chatter, increases edge hold and provides a smooth ride. Four carbon strips give you crazy pop while keeping the nose and tail free for a fun and agile ride. The high-density, extruded base on the Flow Jewel snowboard is extremely easy to maintain and is highly wax absorbent. . Closeout.
short_description: The women's Flow Jewel snowboard is built to dominate rails and jumps. With a freestyle flex and a twin shape, you'll be ready to take on any feature in the park.
